title: VizDefender: Unmasking Visualization Tampering through Proactive Localization and Intent Inference
summary: The integrity of data visualizations is increasingly threatened by image editing techniques that enable subtle yet deceptive tampering. Through a formative study, we define this challenge and categorize tampering techniques into two primary types: data manipulation and visual encoding manipulation.
